description: Extracts structured data from PDF documents and stores it.
Ranks suppliers based on policies and performance data.
Aggregates historical quotes into a comparable structure for downstream evaluation.
Identifies procurement anomalies and savings opportunities.
Drafts communication using an LLM and prepares emails via SES.
Sends approved drafts to suppliers and records dispatch metadata.
Generates supplier negotiation messages using an LLM.
Normalizes supplier communications and routes to the appropriate agent.
Determines approval decisions based on policy thresholds.
Evaluates supplier quotes against historical data and policies.
